db:abstract.db:para: The QSGFlatColorMaterial class provides a convenient way of rendering solid colored geometry in the scene graph.

db:listitem.db:para: QSGFlatColorMaterial is part of Qt Quick Scene Graph Material Classes

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The flat color material will fill every pixel in a geometry using a solid color. The color can contain transparency.

The geometry to be rendered with a flat color material requires vertices in attribute location 0 in the QSGGeometry object to render correctly. The QSGGeometry::defaultAttributes_Point2D() returns an attribute set compatible with this material.
The flat color material respects both current opacity and current matrix when updating its rendering state.

db:section.db:title: QSGFlatColorMaterial::QSGFlatColorMaterial()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new flat color material.

db:section.db:title: const QColor &QSGFlatColorMaterial::color() const
db:section.db:para: Returns this flat color material's color.

db:section.db:title: void QSGFlatColorMaterial::setColor(const QColor &color)
db:section.db:para: Sets this flat color material's color to color.
